giftCardSection.title: Promote Your Profile
giftCardSection.description: Embed a link to your ARTMO profile on your websites.

giftCardContent.title: Send an ARTMO Gift Card via email. The recipient can use it for purchasing artworks.
giftCardContent.lastNote: The card information will be available in the My Account section. You will receive a confirmation receipt to your account email.
giftCardContent.sentFrom: This is your Gift Card sent from...
giftCardContent.use: Use this card for purchasing artworks.
